title: Full Spectrum CBD Tincture
subtitle: Proleve • Full Spectrum
description: Full Spectrum CBD tinctures contain a broader range of hemp compounds, including trace cannabinoids and terpenes. Total Hemp offers Proleve Full Spectrum tinctures in multiple strengths so you can dial in the right potency. Each bottle uses two simple ingredients—full spectrum CBD extract from American‑grown, pesticide‑free hemp and MCT oil to optimize absorption.
metadata_json: {   "product_faqs": [     {       "q": "How should I use CBD tinctures?",       "a": "CBD tinctures are taken sublingually, or under the tongue, to maximize absorption. To use these oils: (1) Open your bottle of Proleve CBD oil and extract the desired dosage using the marked glass pipette. (2) Drop the dosage under your tongue and hold it there for at least 30 seconds before swallowing. This helps CBD absorb into the veins beneath the tongue and reach the bloodstream faster."     },     {       "q": "How much CBD oil should I take?",       "a": "There’s no set guideline to how many milligrams of a CBD tincture you should take per dose. Studies suggest optimal doses in humans range from 20 to 1500 milligrams per day with a strong safety profile, but ideal dosage varies by desired effects, metabolism, and other factors. Many Proleve customers report success starting with one serving size, then increasing gradually until they reach their desired experience."     },     {       "q": "Why Proleve CBD oil?",       "a": "Since 2017, Proleve has been committed to hemp products made to high quality and safety standards. Their team brings decades of product development experience with a focus on purity and effectiveness. Proleve CBD oils are extracted from American-grown hemp cultivated with zero pesticides and formulated in a 23,000 sq/ft, ISO‑certified facility. All products are third‑party lab tested multiple times for safety, potency, and purity. Standards include: Non‑GMO U.S. hemp grown with zero pesticides; ISO third‑party lab testing; ISO‑certified production facility; and full‑spectrum, broad‑spectrum, and THC‑free options."     }   ] }

title: CBD Isolate Capsules
subtitle: Proleve • CBD Isolate
description: Total Hemp offers Proleve CBD Isolate Capsules, which are vegan, organically crafted, and all‑natural. Each capsule contains either 25mg or 50mg of CBD powder in a vegan shell for long‑lasting effects and easy consumption. Capsules are a convenient, on‑the‑go option for those who prefer precise dosing and a neutral‑tasting CBD format.
metadata_json: {"product_faqs":[{"q":"How do CBD capsules support wellness?","a":"Though studies haven’t focused on capsules specifically, Proleve CBD capsules deliver the same wellness support as other ingestible CBD products. Customers report that CBD may help with pain & inflammation, joint mobility, stress, sleep, mood, digestion, and more."},{"q":"Why choose capsules?","a":"CBD capsules are discreet and easy to use, offer precise dosing (25mg or 50mg per capsule), provide long‑lasting effects through digestion, and have a neutral taste for those who prefer CBD without the earthy hemp flavor."},{"q":"What dosage of CBD capsules should I take?","a":"There’s no set dosage for CBD capsules. Proleve capsules range from 25mg to 50mg and are a safe starting point for many users. Start low and go slow—begin with one capsule and increase gradually until you reach your desired effect."},{"q":"Why choose Proleve CBD capsules?","a":"Total Hemp offers Proleve because the brand meets high quality standards: Vegan & Non‑GMO, ISO Certified, Third‑Party Lab Tested, THC‑Free, All‑Natural Ingredients, and American‑grown hemp cultivated with zero pesticides."}]}
